input.sentences: the racers started their practice laps before the actual race began .
the announcers cued the bikers to take their marks .
[male] robinson was in first place for the most part .
robinson ended up finishing first that day .
output.sentences: It had started, the racers were in the race that is.
They had already took their marks, been cued, and the bikers had indeed taken several laps.
We were late, but at least we showed up.
John Robinson was the male in the lead.
At the last moment, Eric Sims passed Robinson, finishing first on this day.
